name: Martin de Porres House of Hospitality
description: Martin de Porres House of Hospitality is a free restaurant, serving lunch Monday through Saturday, 12PM - 2PM. Showers are available Monday through Friday, 10:00AM - 2PM. The mission is to serve in the spirit of compassion, understanding, and love. Guests can choose between eating in the comfort and safety of the courtyard or taking their meals to go. Each person who comes to Martin’s is a guest and is to be treated as such.
